s1.title: Proposed TOC for Consolidated Cocoon Guide
s1.p: Here is a proposed table of contents for a new Cocoon Guide. This means refactoring existing core documents of all three current guides: CTWIG, user, and developer. It also means plugging many content holes. Please post your comments about it to the cocoon-docs mailing list. Even better, help us turn this proposed outline into a real guide by contributing some new docs!
